  3. WAZE:Z

Introduction

WAZE:Z, formerly known as E:LFIN (엘핀), is a four-member independent girl group. Originally a trio, they made their debut on July 18, 2023 with the single album "Love:On". On August 2, 2023, it was announced that Sika has left the group, and that they were planning to add new members soon.

On September 24th, 2024, it was announced that the group had rebranded to WAZE:Z with a lineup of four members: original member Isha (formerly known as SeoA), returning member Sika, and two new members, Summer and Mimi. Ari seemingly left the group quietly before the rebranding. They have yet to set a date for their redebut.
